Gage-Web API Documentation¶

API¶

GET /sections/¶

List all sections

GET /regions/¶

List all regions

GET /section/¶

List all sections

GET /region/¶

List all regions

GET /rivers/¶

List all rivers

GET /about/¶

About this site.

GET /gages/¶

List of gages currently not grouped by regions, or anything else for that matter.

GET /river/¶

List all rivers

GET /gage/¶

List of gages currently not grouped by regions, or anything else for that matter.

GET /¶

Index page

GET /gage/(int: id)/(stype).png¶

Draw a plot for the requested gage’s sensor

GET /static/bootstrap/(path: filename)¶

Function used internally to send static files from the static folder to the browser.

New in version 0.5.

GET /section/(int: id)/¶

Individual section page

GET /section/(slug)¶

Individual section page

GET /region/(int: id)/¶

Individual region page

GET /region/(slug)/¶

Individual region page

GET /static/(path: filename)¶

Function used internally to send static files from the static folder to the browser.

New in version 0.5.

GET /river/(int: id)/¶

Individual section page

GET /river/(slug)/¶

Individual section page

GET /gage/(int: id)/¶

Individual gage page

GET /gage/(slug)/¶

Individual gage page
